General.Name: Sonora Resources Corp
General.Description: The fund is an actively-managed exchange-traded fund ("ETF") that seeks to achieve its investment objective by primarily investing in a portfolio of U.S. traded companies selected from a universe of the largest 3,000 U.S. equity securities based on market capitalization.
